headerTaglineThree: Your next Full Stack Software Engineer

projects.title: Tenant Score
projects.description: Landing page for a game-changing tenant seeker experience created using React.js, Styled Components, HTML, CSS, & JS.

projects.title: No-D NYC (React Native)
projects.description: No-D NYC is a modern platform that blends community and technology, offering tools for connection, collaboration, and growth. A React Native Application built behind the idea that Drug users, Overdose victims, and the Homeless community of NYC can have easy access to local centers for aid. Stack: React Native, Node.js, MongoDB

projects.title: VFluence by Vibranium Network (Blockchain dApp)
projects.description: V-Fluence is a blockchain app that combines social networking and social media, letting users post tributes and bounties with real monetary rewards in exchange for social media content engagement. Stack: Next.js, Next,js Serverless, Node.js, Solidity, Chainlink, IPFS, AWS, & Docker.

projects.title: Islamic Society of Guelph (TV App)
projects.description: A cross-platform system built for Android TVs with mobile companion apps to display prayer times, announcements, Hadiths, and notifications. Each screen is shown for a set duration (seconds to minutes), with real-time updates synced from mobile apps. Designed with a TV-optimized UI, clear typography, and accessible layouts for seamless community engagement. Stack: React Native, React, Node.js, MongoDB

projects.title: Islamic Society of Guelph (Website)
projects.description: Redesigned and developed a responsive, user-friendly platform that streamlines access to prayer times, events, and community resources. The site emphasizes clean navigation, accessible design, and clear information architecture to improve the user experience for a diverse audience. Stack: MERN

aboutpara:
Hello, World! My name is Ahmad, and I am a full-stack software engineer focused on the Front End.

My technology stack includes:

HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Styled Components, Javascript, MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Firebase, Google Auth, Azure Auth, Azure Machine Learning, PostgreSQL, NoSQL, OOP, Web Accessibility, and much more!
